pages.text: Oops! You accidentally used a diamond block instead of a dirt block on a frame block. But don't worry, you can make yourself a hammer. Right-click a filled frame or illusion block to make it drop the block it is mimicking. The advantage of clearing the frame or illusion block with a hammer compared to simply
breaking the block is all modifications done are left as-is. If you dislike the concept of the hammer, you can disable the config option $(o)hammer_needed$() in the mod's config file.
